attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: charity must begin at home not abroad,surely gb citizens come 1st,our foreighn brothers have come and taken our homes, jobs,our tax is laboured by there presence,as is our health system and education system,is britain the britain of older times- i think not!it is worrying to think that our children will mab caught up in wars that have emigrated from the  middle east and on to our shores , is this so far fetched?i feel that as the make up and fabric of britain changes ie the people,things will most probably reach a flash point between the war afflicted cultures that willb firmly rooted in our great britain in the future.this must not happen.as long as we are prepared to pay free meal tickets and benefit claims,we are giving and so they will be taking. common sense now not tommorow!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
